analysisEngineMetaData.name: POS Density Feature: Plural Adjective
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Calculates adjective density of the text. Plural adjectives include for Italian: Ap APp
This feature is not available for: English, German.
Formula: adjDensity = numPluralAdjectives / numTokens
AAE dependency: SentenceAnnotator.xml TokenAnnotator.xml NTokenFeature.xml POSAnnotator.xml
